about_the_game:
The Unknown Ethnics Music Pack by Ayato Sound Create features inspired music from multiple cultures that is ideal for setting the scene throughout several locations in your next RPG. With multiple tracks that include Arab, Asian, Celtic, Japanese, and Primitive inspirations – there is plenty here to build your next RPG around. Will your next main story or side quest feature the sounds inspired by one of these cultures?

Features:

* 25 BGM songs featuring instruments from various cultures all around the world
* mp3, m4a, ogg, wav, and looping ogg file formats included

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
